title: If we don't get something a little more substantial with this new champion beyond the teaser:
body: I think Marvel is going to sue the fuck out of somebody. I don't even need to explain why.

replies.body: Why would Marvel sue League of Legends because of a new champion teaser?
Clearly you can not comprehend the OP well enough. Invest in proper schooling for your kids, folks!
No I actual don't know how Marvel would sue League of Legends over this teaser, please tell me how?
